import React from "react" import {Container,Row ,Col,Form,ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails =()=>{ const {id} =useParams() //this is an static data later we will call our Api vand load our data from db const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id ==id) // destructure properties from tour object const{photo,title,desc,price,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize} =tour return <> {

{tour}
} } export default TourDetails;
